name: Unrelenting Cold
description: Frozen Orb's damage is increased by <dynamic>10.0% - 40%</dynamic>.

name: Shivering Core
description: Blizzard's damage and movement speed reduction are increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Icy Propulsion
description: While Icy Veins is active, your critical hits reduce its cooldown by <dynamic>0.30 sec - 1.92 sec</dynamic>.

name: Ice Bite
description: Increases the damage of Ice Lance against frozen enemies by <dynamic>10.0% - 50%</dynamic>.

name: Winter's Protection
description: The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by <dynamic>30 sec - 90 sec</dynamic>.

name: Flow of Time
description: The cooldown of Blink is reduced by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 5 sec</dynamic>.

name: Grounding Surge
description: Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 8 sec</dynamic>.

name: Infernal Cascade
description: While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast grants you <dynamic>3.0%  - 10%</dynamic> increased Fire damage for 5 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

name: Master Flame
description: Flamestrike's damage and radius are increased by <dynamic>6.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Arcane Prodigy
description: Arcane Missiles reduce the cooldown of Arcane Power by <dynamic>0.1 sec - 1.5 sec</dynamic>.

name: Nether Precision
description: Consuming Clearcasting increases the damage of your next 2 Arcane Blasts by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Discipline of the Grove
description: Shifting Power channels <dynamic>5% - 50%</dynamic> faster.

name: Gift of the Lich
description: Deathborne's duration is increased by<dynamic> 3.0 sec - 10 sec</dynamic>.

name: Ire of the Ascended
description: Radiant Spark increases the damage your spells deal to the target by an additional <dynamic>2.0% - 8%</dynamic>.

name: Siphoned Malice
description: Each time a Mirror of Torment is consumed your spell damage is increased by <dynamic>1.0% - 2.4%</dynamic> for 10 sec, stacking 3 times.

name: Cryo-Freeze
description: While inside Ice Block, you heal for <dynamic>20% - 66.67%</dynamic> of your maximum health over the duration.

name: Diverted Energy
description: Your Barriers heal you for <dynamic>20% - 60%</dynamic> of the damage absorbed.

name: Magi's Brand
description: Touch of Magi accumulates an additional <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> of the damage you deal.

name: Flame Accretion
description: Fireball grants <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> Mastery when it fails to critically strike.

name: Artifice of the Archmage
description: Your Arcane Barrage has a <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> chance to grant 2 Arcane Charges.

name: Incantation of Swiftness
description:
<spec>Arcane (Level 47)</spec>
<dynamic>Greater</dynamic>

Invisibility increases your movement speed by <dynamic>20%</dynamic> for 6 sec.

name: Tempest Barrier
description: Gain a shield that absorbs <dynamic>5.0% - 15%</dynamic> of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.

name: Controlled Destruction
description: Pyroblast damage increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.
